slide.text: Session 5. EUS-guided Tissue Acquisition (2016.9.10) The best technique to perform EUS-FNA/B SHOMEI RYOZAWA Department of Gastroenterology Saitama Medical University International Medical Center

slide.title: EUS-FNA
slide.notes: As you know, EUS-FNA started in 1992.
slide.notesNormalized: as you know, eus-fna started in 1992.
slide.notesHtml: As you know, EUS-FNA started in 1992.
slide.text: EUS-FNA Gastrointest Endosc. 38: 172-3, 1992

slide.title: Hamburg Univ. Eppendorf Hosp., 2000
slide.notes: I learn EUS-FNA in 2000 in Hamburg and this year Prof. Seo visited Hamburg Univ. Very young.

slide.text: Hamburg Univ. Eppendorf Hosp., 2000 Prof. N Soehendra Dr. Dong Wan Seo

slide.title: Indications of EUS-FNA
slide.notes: The indication of EUS-FNA is not limited only in pancreatic lesions. The indications is for many fields.
slide.notesNormalized: the indication of eus-fna is not limited only in pancreatic lesions. the indications is for many fields.
slide.notesHtml: The indication of EUS-FNA is not limited only in pancreatic lesions. The indications is for many fields.
slide.text: Pancreatic mass Mediastinal lymph node Esophageal or lung cancer Celiac lymph nodes Posterior mediastinal mass Intra-abdominal lymph node Peritoneal fluid Liver metastases Perirectal lymph node/mass (Hawes et al. Digestive Endoscopy,2001) Indications of EUS-FNA

slide.title: Department of Gastroenterology, Saitama Medical University International Medical Center
slide.titleNormalized: department of gastroenterology, saitama medical university international medical center
slide.notes: In 25 studies published between 1997 to 2008, it is reported the accuracy was 88%.
slide.notesNormalized: in 25 studies published between 1997 to 2008, it is reported the accuracy was 88%.
slide.notesHtml: In 25 studies published between 1997 to 2008, it is reported the accuracy was 88%.
slide.text: Br J Surg 2009;96:5-20 25 studies published between 1997 and 2008 Sensitivity (%): 83 (54-95) Specificity (%): 100 (71-100) NPV (%): 72 (16-92) Accuracy (%): 88 (65-96)

slide.title: The best technique to perform EUS-FNA/B
slide.titleNormalized: the best technique to perform eus-fna/b
slide.notes: Today, I talk on how to control the echoendoscope and the technique to perform EUS-FNA/B.
slide.notesNormalized: today, i talk on how to control the echoendoscope and the technique to perform eus-fna/b.
slide.notesHtml: Today, I talk on how to control the echoendoscope and the technique to perform EUS-FNA/B.

slide.title: The best technique to perform EUS-FNA/B
slide.titleNormalized: the best technique to perform eus-fna/b
slide.text: How to control the echoendoscope Technique to perform EUS-FNA/B The best technique to perform EUS-FNA/B

slide.title: Convex type Echoendoscope
slide.notes: As you know, convex type echoendoscope visualize the image parallel to the endoscope.
slide.notesNormalized: as you know, convex type echoendoscope visualize the image parallel to the endoscope.
slide.notesHtml: As you know, convex type echoendoscope visualize the image parallel to the endoscope.
slide.text: OLYMPUS GF TYPE UCT260 Convex type Echoendoscope

slide.title: Convex type Echoendoscope
slide.notes: So, we should rotate scope clockwise and counter-clockwise to visualize the 360 degree.
slide.notesNormalized: so, we should rotate scope clockwise and counter-clockwise to visualize the 360 degree.
slide.notesHtml: So, we should rotate scope clockwise and counter-clockwise to visualize the 360 degree.
slide.text: Rotate the scope clockwise and counter clockwise for complete imaging. How to control the endoscope Convex type Echoendoscope

slide.title: How to control the ehoendoscope
slide.notes: To rotate the scope, you should not angulate the shaft of the scope. Then, it will be difficult to rotate the scope.
slide.notesNormalized: to rotate the scope, you should not angulate the shaft of the scope. then, it will be difficult to rotate the scope.
slide.notesHtml:
To rotate the scope, you should not angulate the shaft of the scope.

Then, it will be difficult to rotate the scope.
slide.text:
× The shaft of the scope is angulated.
→ It is difficult to rotate the scope clockwise and counter clockwise. How to control the ehoendoscope

slide.title: How to control the ehoendoscope
slide.notes: The shaft should be straighten. Then, it will be easier to rotate the scope.
slide.notesNormalized: the shaft should be straighten. then, it will be easier to rotate the scope.
slide.notesHtml: The shaft should be straighten. Then, it will be easier to rotate the scope.
slide.text:
◎ The shaft of the scope is straight.
→ It is easy to rotate the scope clockwise and counter clockwise.
How to control the ehoendoscope

slide.title: How to control the ehoendoscope
slide.notes: And you should move the scope handle from left shoulder to right shoulder.
slide.notesNormalized: and you should move the scope handle from left shoulder to right shoulder.
slide.notesHtml: And you should move the scope handle from left shoulder to right shoulder.
slide.text: to Left shoulder right shoulder How to control the ehoendoscope

slide.title: How to control the ehoendoscope
slide.text: Shoulder turn How to control the ehoendoscope

slide.title: EUS-FNA
slide.text: EUS-FNA

slide.title: Preparation for histological examination
slide.notes: 採取検体の取り扱い ホルマリン内に直接検体を押し出す。 やさしく瓶を数回振る。（血液を除く） 白色の組織が確認できる。
slide.notesNormalized: 採取検体の取り扱い ホルマリン内に直接検体を押し出す。 やさしく瓶を数回振る。（血液を除く） 白色の組織が確認できる。
slide.notesHtml:
採取検体の取り扱い

ホルマリン内に直接検体を押し出す。

やさしく瓶を数回振る。（血液を除く）

白色の組織が確認できる。
slide.text:
Push out the specimen into the formalin.
Shake the formalin tenderly and remove the blood. You can find out the whitish specimen.
Preparation for histological examination

slide.title: Histology
slide.text: Mod-well differentiated adenocarcinoma 63y.o. F; pancreatic body tumor Histology

slide.title: Preparation for cytological examination
slide.notes: スライドガラス上に検体を押し出す。 スメアを引く。 エタノール固定する。
slide.notesNormalized: スライドガラス上に検体を押し出す。 スメアを引く。 エタノール固定する。
slide.notesHtml:
スライドガラス上に検体を押し出す。

スメアを引く。

エタノール固定する。
slide.text:
Push out the specimen on the glass slides.
Prepare smears.
Fixed in ethanol.
Preparation for cytological examination

slide.title: Cytology
slide.text: adenocarcinoma 69y.o. M; pancreatic head tumor Cytology

slide.title: ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation
slide.text: When a cytotechnician is able to attend in the examination room, a quick cytodiagnosis is available. ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation

slide.title: ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation
slide.text: The Yokohama Live 2012 ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation

slide.title: ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation
slide.notes: Cyto-quick染色は、スライドガラスを染色液Ⅰに15秒、染色液Ⅱに5秒間つける。その後、余分な染色液を蒸留水で軽く洗い流す。
slide.notesNormalized: cyto-quick染色は、スライドガラスを染色液ⅰに15秒、染色液ⅱに5秒間つける。その後、余分な染色液を蒸留水で軽く洗い流す。
slide.notesHtml: Cyto-quick染色は、スライドガラスを染色液Ⅰに15秒、染色液Ⅱに5秒間つける。その後、余分な染色液を蒸留水で軽く洗い流す。
slide.text: ROSE: rapid on-site cytopathological evaluation Cyto-quick stain: 15 sec.(liquid A) + 5 sec.(liquid B)

slide.title: Door Knocking Method
slide.notes: Next, I talk about the method of EUS-FNA.
slide.notesNormalized: next, i talk about the method of eus-fna.
slide.notesHtml: Next, I talk about the method of EUS-FNA.
slide.text: Door Knocking Method

slide.title: Fanning technique
slide.notes: Another technique is Fanning technique. This is also famous. The fanning….
slide.notesNormalized: another technique is fanning technique. this is also famous. the fanning….
slide.notesHtml:
Another technique is Fanning technique.

This is also famous.

The fanning….
slide.text:
Fanning technique Bang JY et al. Endoscopy 2013;45:445-50 54 patients Normal technique vs fanning technique Diagnostic adequacy: 76.9% vs. 96.4%, p=0.05 No of passes required to establish diagnosis: 1[1-3] vs. 1[1-1], p=0.02 Patients in whom a diagnosis was achieved on pass one: 57.7% vs. 85.7%, p=0.02
The fanning technique of FNA was superior to the standard approach because fewer passes were required to establish the diagnosis.

slide.title: Size of the needle
slide.text: GIE 2011;74:504-10 EUS-FNA by using a large-gauge needle has a high yield and promising diagnostic accuracy and could be used when histology may be more useful than cytology to reach a definitive diagnosis. Size of the needle

slide.title: Size of the needle
slide.text: GIE 2009;69:506-16 The 22-gauge or 25-gauge needles are suitable for insertion into the target regions if tight angulation is necessary. Size of the needle

slide.title: Size of the needle
slide.text: J Gastroenterology and Hepatology 2009;24:384-390 The 25-gauge needle was significantly superior in terms of technical success rate and overall diagnostic accuracy, especially for the head and uncinate lesions. Size of the needle

slide.title: Size of the needle
slide.notes: You should choose the sizw of the needle depend on the location and the lesion.
slide.notesNormalized: you should choose the sizw of the needle depend on the location and the lesion.
slide.notesHtml: You should choose the sizw of the needle depend on the location and the lesion.
slide.text:
Passage
Specimen
Risk 25G easy
small
safe 22G
19G difficult
large
risky Size of the needle

slide.title: Size of the needle
slide.text: 1 2 3 Stations ①pancreatic body to tail ②③pancreatic head Size of the needle

slide.text: →25G Stations ①pancreatic body to tail ②③pancreatic head Size of the needle
